rom:
0001100000000000 : MOV R0, #0
1111100100011100 : OUT R0, #0xF
0001101000000010 : MOV R2, #2
1111100001010100 : OUT R2, #5
1111100101001000 : OUT R2, #0xA
1110001001000000 : ROL R2, R2
1111001101000001 : IN R3, R2
1101001001000000 : ROR R2, R2
1111000001001110 : OUT R2, R3
0001101011111110 : MOV R2, #0xFE
1011101101000100 : SHR R3, R2, #4
1100110001000100 : SHL R4, R2, #4
1110011001000000 : ROL R6, R2
1101010101100000 : ROR R5, R3
1111111111111111 : HALT
